title: Kitchen Ideas & Inspiration - IKEA
text: Kitchen Design your dream kitchen step by step Transform your dream kitchen into reality with IKEA! Explore our wide selection of materials, colors, finishes and styles to create a space that’s uniquely yours. Customizing your kitchen has never been easier, thanks to our flexible planning options. Whether you install it yourself or take advantage of our professional installation services, we recommend booking a free in-store or online kitchen consultation today to start your journey. 1 - Get inspired & find your style 2 - Measure & prepare 3 - Plan & design 4 - Order & install 5 - Finishing touches 40 weeks of deals: Up to 20% off select kitchen stools & serveware 40 weeks of savings are here for the IKEA 40th anniversary. Hurry, this IKEA Family offer is valid thru 2/8. Not a member? Join today for free. Business customer? Join IKEA Business Network for free. 1 - Browse kitchen ideas & inspiration to find your style Now is the time to dream! Consider your preferred aesthetic—from traditional to farmhouse to modern kitchen style—and your preferences for colors, materials and features. Do you envision an open solution that connects the kitchen with the living room? Should there be space for a dining table, or do you prefer stools around a kitchen island? Explore some of the countless kitchen possibilities below. Discover your favorite kitchen front style Explore our different kitchen systems SEKTION - endless possibilities for styles Most flexible and popular system with the largest range of styles and colors to choose from with a variety of sizes and prices. Includes a 25-year limited warranty. KNOXHULT - basic functions at a low price Our most basic kitchen at an affordable price, simple style and easy assembly. Includes a 5-year limited warranty. ENHET - easy and flexible solutions Easy kitchen to buy, plan and assemble that offers high quality at an affordable price. Includes a 10-year limited warranty. Kitchen design inspiration As seen on Instagram 10-year limited warranty ENHET kitchen system, sinks and faucets have a 10-year limited warranty. Learn more2 - Get the perfect kitchen measurements Getting the perfect measurements for your new kitchen is a must, as mistakes in measuring can throw off an entire project. To ensure every element of your new kitchen fits precisely into place, our team requires detailed measurements of the room’s dimensions, the location of windows and doors, water and electricity connections, pipes, extraction and other obstacles in the room. We measure for you The kitchen measurement service provides a reliable foundation to plan your new kitchen and peace of mind that all your planning will lead to perfection. The process of scheduling an in-home appointment with one of our measurement technicians is quick and easy. This service ensures that correct measurements are taken and documented, including details such as outlets, plumbing, and more. Best of all, the $79 fee is applied toward your qualifying Kitchen Installation service.* You measure it yourself If you choose to take measurements yourself, it is important that you do not forget anything. Your accurate measurements will be the basis for all your planning. Explore our guide to ensure correct measurement. 3 - Kitchen planning & design With your precise kitchen measurements at-hand, it’s time to plan your design! Experiment with bringing your dream kitchen to life with our 3D kitchen planning tool, or let one of our kitchen experts assist you in-store or through a virtual appointment. Make your dream kitchen a reality The IKEA Projekt credit card special financing can help jump start your big home upgrade with 0% interest for 24 months on a purchase of $2,500 or more, after that, purchase APR of 21.99%.^ Business owner? Join IKEA Business Network today The IKEA Business Network is our loyalty program designed for businesses to help you create a better life at work. Join now to get access to our Interior Design Service, employee perks, online trainings, discounts and much more. Yes, it’s free to join! 4 - Order & install your new kitchen From ensuring every element of your kitchen planning project is just-right to assembling and installing your kitchen, IKEA supports you every step of the way. An IKEA kitchen is designed so that you can assemble it yourself. However, we recommend that you work with our professional installation service team for the least stress, most confidence and best results. IKEA kitchen experts have extensive experience and familiarity with all our kitchen designs and can take care of everything for you from start to finish, including installing integrated lighting and appliances. Learn more about IKEA kitchen services. 5 - Finishing touches to complete your kitchen Ideas and tips for more sustainable living More kitchen ideas and inspiration Make your dream kitchen a reality Whether you’re completing a full kitchen renovation or making small improvements, IKEA has everything you need to make your dream kitchen a reality. With IKEA Kitchens, you’ll find inspiration and solutions for every step of your kitchen remodel or upgrade. Your new IKEA Kitchen Whether your kitchen is large or small, we can offer you a wide range of well-designed and coordinated kitchen products that’ll support your every need, style and personality. Plus, we’re here if you need help with planning, delivery or financing. Learn more about our kitchen systems. Kitchen refresh on a budget Simply looking to refresh your current kitchen on a budget? It’s easy to change the look of your kitchen and create something new without remodeling your entire space. Just check out our great selection of kitchen sinks and faucets, countertops, backsplashes and knobs and handles, all in different styles, patterns and colors. Small changes to your kitchen can truly make the biggest difference. Quality, affordable appliances We offer stylish and affordable appliances that make your everyday life easier. Our kitchen appliances are packed with smart functions and built to stand up to everyday demands — now and for years to come. Shop a wide range of energy efficient appliances including refrigerators and freezers, ranges, ovens, microwaves, cooktops, dishwashers and more. Kitchen cabinets in all styles What does your dream kitchen look like? How much time will you spend in it and what will you do in there? Fitted or unfitted for more style and contrast? When it comes to kitchens, we’re all different. So, to meet this diversity, what could be better than a flexible kitchen system with cabinets that can suit everyone, and be planned to fit in almost everywhere? Whatever the size of your home or family, with cabinets in different sizes, drawers with endless possibilities and interior organizers made to match, you can turn the kitchen of your dreams into the kitchen in your home. With a variety of different kitchen cabinet series to choose from, you can be sure to find a color, style, and look for every preference or budget. Enjoy modern quality that you can trust with a 25-year limited warranty on all IKEA kitchen cabinets. 50 years of kitchen experience We’ve been developing kitchens for half a century. For decades we’ve been listening to people all over the world in order to design kitchens that will meet your everyday needs for years to come. Our long experience has led to stylish, functional and hard-working kitchens that you’ll love spending countless hours in. So, rest assured – we have the experience and knowledge needed to guide you every step of the way to your dream kitchen.
